description: Try our easy to follow Parmesan Zucchini Ribbons recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Zucchini,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Parmesan Zucchini Ribbons Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Trim zucchini. Run a vegetable peeler down the length of zucchinis to form thin ribbons. Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil. Add zucchini. When water returns to the boil, remove pot from heat and drain.
Return zucchini to pan with olive oil and add cup of finely grated parmesan.
Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and toss.
Sprinkle with extra finely grated parmesan to serve.
